title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 30 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 30 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: I will extol thee, O LORD; for thou hast lifted me up, and hast not made my foes to rejoice over me.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，我要尊崇你，因为你曾提拔我，不叫仇敌向我夸耀。

lineList.en: O LORD my God, I cried unto thee, and thou hast healed me.
lineList.cn: 耶和华我的神阿，我曾呼求你，你医治了我。

lineList.en: O LORD, thou hast brought up my soul from the grave: thou hast kept me alive, that I should not go down to the pit.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你曾把我的灵魂从阴间救上来，使我存活，不至于下坑。

lineList.en: Sing unto the LORD, O ye saints of his, and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的圣民哪，你们要歌颂他，称赞他可记念的圣名。

lineList.en: For his anger endureth but a moment; in his favour is life: weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.
lineList.cn: 因为他的怒气不过是转眼之间。他的恩典乃是一生之久。一宿虽然有哭泣，早晨便必欢呼。

lineList.en: And in my prosperity I said, I shall never be moved.
lineList.cn: 至于我，我凡事平顺，便说，我永不动摇。

lineList.en: LORD, by thy favour thou hast made my mountain to stand strong: thou didst hide thy face, and I was troubled.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你曾施恩，叫我的江山稳固。你掩了面，我就惊惶。

lineList.en: I cried to thee, O LORD; and unto the LORD I made supplication.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，我曾求告你。我向耶和华恳求，说，

lineList.en: What profit is there in my blood, when I go down to the pit? Shall the dust praise thee? shall it declare thy truth?
lineList.cn: 我被害流血，下到坑中，有什么益处呢。尘土岂能称赞你，传说你的诚实吗。

lineList.en: Hear, O LORD, and have mercy upon me: LORD, be thou my helper.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你应允我，怜恤我。耶和华阿，求你帮助我。

lineList.en: Thou hast turned for me my mourning into dancing: thou hast put off my sackcloth, and girded me with gladness;
lineList.cn: 你已将我的哀哭变为跳舞，将我的麻衣脱去，给我披上喜乐。

lineList.en: To the end that my glory may sing praise to thee, and not be silent. O LORD my God, I will give thanks unto thee for ever.
lineList.cn: 好叫我的灵（原文作荣耀）歌颂你，并不住声。耶和华我的神阿，我要称谢你，直到永远。
